title: (x) SWAT font - (similar to) Block Gothic {Jan Sandvik}
content:
Here are a couple of suggestions:   
   
   
 [Block Gothic RR Light Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142337/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/block-gothic-rr/light-extra-condensed/testdrive.html?s=SAMUEL%2BL.%2BJACKSON&p=72)   
   
 [Jay Gothic T Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142337/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/jay-gothic/urw-t-light/testdrive.html?s=SAMUEL%2BL.%2BJACKSON&p=72)
author: jsandvik
